name: I WANT TO BE POPULAR!
description:
Hey, you! Yes, you. Do you want to know what's this game about? Keep reading.

Have you ever felt the difficulties of having a public life in social media? Have you been annoyed by comments from people who hide in anonymity to say insulting things? Well, this game is for you!

Mochi, The Bunny, just downloaded Ducktter, the new social media!  Information about how this game was made:

This game was made for the Spain Game Devs (Jam II) by Yeray Toledano and Mateu Camps.

  • Yeray Toledano, game designer, made the idea and concept, sprites, pixel art and programming using:
    •  Unity 3D with Bolt.
    • Aseprite.
  • Mateu Camps made all the music and FX especially for this game using:
    • FL Studio 20.
    • StageCraft Bit Crusher.
    • Adobe Audition CC 2020.
    • Bfxr.
